name: Cowboy Coffee Co.
description: Cozy local cafe with exposed beams & art-lined walls preparing house-roasted coffee & sandwiches.

name: Wyoming Inn of Jackson Hole
description: This upscale hotel is 1.2 miles from George Washington Memorial Park and 2 miles from Snow King Mountain. It's also 11 miles from Jackson Hole Airport.

name: Center for the Arts
description: Cool venue for the arts as well as concerts.

name: Million Dollar Cowboy Bar
description: American chow & drinks come in a rustic space with memorabilia plus dancing & live entertainment.

name: Pinky G's Pizzeria- Jackson Hole, WY
description: Local hangout serving pizzas with unique topping combinations in a chill tavern-style setting.
